subject: Pedal connection to games
description_text:
Hello!

Just bought a Simsonn Plus X pedals but when starting a game like Le Mans
Ultimate or Assetto Corsa Competizione, the pedals are not detected.

In the Simsonn Manager 2.0.8, the pedals are detected and when i press the
brake/throttle it works completely normally. But if i start a game, there
is no input whatsoever.

conversations.body_text: Hi Emil Erngård,  Has your pedal been successfully calibrated? You need to complete the calibration in SIMSONN Manager first, otherwise the game won’t recognize it correctly. Our system fully supports both Assetto Corsa Competizione (ACC) and Le Mans Ultimate (LMU).
